item.title: Dice game help
item.dc:creator: @deadrose91 deadrose91
item.description:
@deadrose91 wrote:

hello thanks for reading my problem ok what ive been doing is trying to make my dice game on my runescape private server shout out the number i roll like heres my command i have.

[code]hello prim i was working on my dice game in runescape private servers and what i have is

if (command.startsWith(“roll”) && playerRights > 0){
int message = misc.random(100);//Made by Aaron (co-owner of Dynasty PKz)
if(message == 0)
sM(“YOU ROLL A 1!”);
else if(message == 1)
sM(“YOU ROLL A 2!”);
else if(message == 2)
sM(“YOU ROLL A 3!”);
}

[/code]

thats just the short version but anyways i was seeing if anybody know how i can make the “you roll a 1!” numbers actually shout out .

Read full topic
